channel.title: NPM on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in NPM on Notes

item.title: Deploy functions on Spotinst using Serverless Framework
item.description: Spotinst is one of the providers which support deploying serverless functions or FaaS (Function as a Service).

item.title: Implement a Javascript Client for Crypto Compare API
item.description: Crypto Compare Crypto Compare is a website and API provider which brings you all the latest streaming pricing data in the world of cryptocurrencies.

item.title: NPM Module - Complex JSON to Query String
item.description: @abskmj/query It is an NPM module that converts complex JSON with arrays and nested objects into URL parameters or query string.

item.title: Developing an Angular project on Cloud9 IDE
item.description: Update NodeJS version All of the blank VMs on cloud9 have nvm pre installed.

item.title: Track API usage with Google Analytics
item.description: Google analytics is a popular tool to track your website usage.
